export async function GET(){ const encoder = new TextEncoder(); const stream = new ReadableStream({ start(controller){ let i=0; const id=setInterval(()=>{ controller.enqueue(encoder.encode(`data: msg ${++i}

`)); if(i>=5){ clearInterval(id); controller.close(); } }, 200); } }); return new Response(stream, { headers:{ 'content-type':'text/event-stream', 'cache-control':'no-cache', 'connection':'keep-alive' } }); }
